t: From A to Z: The story behind the iconic Amazon Music logo
s: August 2, 2023 - The Amazon Music logo is one of the most recognizable emblems in the streaming space. Not only does it grab attention with its simple, modern design, but it also leverages components of the larger Amazon brand’s visual identity. This ensures Amazon fans can instantly spot the iconic emblem.
